writer.name: 斯特凡纳·维耶 Stéphane Vuillet

director.name: 斯特凡纳·维耶 Stéphane Vuillet

introduction: Goma, Democratic Republic of Congo, September 2022. BRAVÓ, 16 years old, is exfiltrated from an armed group by the team of the CTO (Transit and Orientation Centre) in order to be reintegrated into society. But the young man, who has only known war and fighting, does not submit to the rules of the centre. As a lieutenant in the forest, Bravo refuses to be treated like the other children and does not want this new place he is being offered. However, secretly he only dreams of one thing, to find his family…
